name: VAMASHIP SHIPPING
author: Vamaship

sections.description:
The Vamaship application is only available in India.
Vamaship is an integrated logistics marketplace for businesses.

It allows the merchant to ship the Order to their customer through Vamaship Shipping Service. Fast Reliable and helpful management.
Over 1000 businesses use Vamaship to ship within India to over 25,000+ pincodes and for exporting to and importing from 200 countries!

VAMASHIP ADVANTAGES

1.One Stop For Within India and International Shipments of General, Valuable and Perishable Cargo
2.One Platform for Forward, Reverse, Air and Surface Shipments
3.Geographical Coverage to over 200+ Countries And 25,000+ Pin Codes Within India
4.Cash on Delivery Service Across India
5.One Point of Contact from Vamaship Regardless of Delivery Partners
6.Tracking of All Shipments & One NDR Among All Partners
7.Bulk Booking Through API Integration & Excel
8.Deep Analytics on Shipments For Better Optimisation
9.Custom Labels With Your Logo For Each Shipment
10.Platform Enabled on Web, Android, iOS, Mac OS, Windows and Linux
11.No Minimum Shipping Spend Needed to Start
12.No Charge For Using the Vamaship Platform, Pay Only For Shipping

SHIPPABLE PRODUCT CATEGORIES

*General Cargo (clothes, accessories, electronics, stationery, cosmetics, dry food, books, luggage, furniture, home products etc.)

*Valuable Cargo (diamonds, studded jewellery, plain jewellery, silver jewellery, gold coins, gold bars, gemstones etc.)

Just sign up, sign the agreement, upload your KYC documents and start shipping!<h3>SHIPPABLE PRODUCT CATEGORIES</h3>

Aramax, Delhivery, FedEx, Ecom Express, UPS, Bluedart<h3>SUPPORT</h3>If you need support or have any question then kindly send us an email at [care@vamaship.com](care@vamaship.com)
sections.installation:
Automatic installation

Automatic installation is the easiest option as WordPress handles the file transfers itself and you don’t need to leave your web browser. To do an automatic install of Vamaship Shipping, log in to your WordPress dashboard, navigate to the Plugins menu and click Add New.

In the search field type “Vamaship Shipping” and click Search Plugins. Once you’ve found our Vamaship Shipping plugin you can view details about it such as the point release, rating and description. Most importantly of course, you can install it by simply clicking “Install Now”.

Manual installation

The manual installation method involves downloading our Vamaship Shipping and uploading it to your web server via your favourite FTP application. The WordPress codex contains instructions on how to do this here.

Updating

Automatic updates should work like a charm; as always though, ensure you backup your site just in case.

1.0.0

  • Initial plugin

1.0.1

  • Minor issue fix

1.0.2

  • Minor issue fix

1.1.0

  • Added meta box on order edit page to change package dimensions
  • Added setting to set default shipment type
